talents.name: limb-splitter
changes: now 100% instead of 50%

talents.name: hellborg's tutelage
changes: now allows crits

talents.name: reikland reaper
changes: gives 20% power

talents.name: enhanced training
changes: only needs 1 target to trigger

talents.name: Stand Clear
changes: also grants infinite effective dodges

talents.name: black market
changes: receive 2.5% ammo on elite melee kills

talents.name: On yer feet
changes: now gives 70% dr to players that get revived

huntsman.name: huntsman
passives: aura now gives 1 ammo on headshot instead of 5% crit
now has a passive that gives 10% ammo on special kill

talents.name: make 'em bleed
changes: is replaced with Haste. Every ranged hit has a 10% chance to activate Haste. When Haste is active you gain 40% attack speed and your reloads don't consume ammo for 7 seconds.

talents.name: shot crafter
changes: now bleeds enemies hit by melee attacks

talents.name: thick Hide
changes: now gives 5% dr for 15 seconds on elite/special kill. Max stacks of 4

talents.name: longshanks
changes: is replaced with a talent that removes aim punch/makes shots pinpoint accurate. See blunderbuss for some interesting side effects (mostly its a bit jank ok)

foot-knight.name: foot knight
passives: cd on getting hit from 0.5 to 0.35

talents.name: Have at Thee!
changes: Duration 10 -> 15

talents.name: Crowd Clearer
changes: Duration 3 -> 5

talents.name: Inspiring Blow
changes: Now gives 200% cooldown regen for 1.5 seconds. Only applies to Footknight

talents.name: It's Hero Time
changes: Make its so going from 1 -> 2 Incapacitated and up also gives ult back

talents.name: Numb to Pain
changes: Also grants immunity to disablers and duration increased to 4 seconds.

talents.name: Wide Charge
changes: 50% Increase in Power of Melee attacks for 6 seconds

grail-knight.name: grail knight
passives: Lowered cleave on base and stab from 0.3 to 0.2
Increased cleave on swipe ult from 0.5 to 0.75

talents.name: Knightly temper
changes: now also gives 10% crit chance

talents.name: Heroism
changes: now increases your damage against first targets to 70% (From the passive 25%) (It's not as good as you think)

talents.name: Penitent
changes: now scales with cata 2 and 3. Gives 250 on cata 2 and 300 on cata 3

talents.name: Virtue of Discipline
changes: Increases dodge range by 20%% and grants infinite effective dodges.

talents.name: Virtue of the Impetuous Knight
changes: now also gives immunity to ranged knock back like ratilings. Has a cooldown reduction of 30%

weapons.name: 1h Mace
changes: Gave it a dodge count of 4

Light 1,2 and push attack: Increased cleave slightly, Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Increased damage against the first target (0.175 -> 0.225), Power increased against target 2 from 0.075 to 0.15, Now deals 35% damage to armour on the light.

Light 3,4: Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Damage multiplier against zerkers improved from 0.75 to 1.25, Damage multiplier against monsters improved from 2.5 to 3, Sped up light 4 by 15% (1.35 -> 1.5).
Heavy: Increased range by 20%, Super armour damage is now equal to infantry damage, Damage multiplier against monsters improved from 1.75 to 2.5.

weapons.name: 1h Sword
changes: Gave it a dodge count of 4
light 1 and 2: Changed headshot curve from smiter to ninja. This increases the headshot damage and crit damage but the headshot + crit damage is the same as before. Increased base damage by ~20%.
light 3: Added shield break,Increased range by 20%.
Heavy: Reduced cleave, Increased armour damage from 0.5 to 0.75, Increased range by 20%, Increased damage against target 1 from 0.3 to 0.4, Increased damage against target 2 from 0.1 to 0.2.

weapons.name: 2h Sword
changes: Lights: Increased headshot coefficient to 2 from 1.5, Increased stagger cleave by ~20%, Increased damage by 20%.
Push attack: Sped up by 15%.

Heavy: Increased the damage targets 2 and up receive, Lowered zerker damage from 1 to 0.6, Lowered armour damage against first target from 0.3 to 0.25, Lowered armour damage against second target from 0.4 to 0.2.

weapons.name: 2h Hammer
changes: lights: Increased monster damage from 2.5 to 3.
light 3: Sped up by a lot and gave 1h mace light 1 and 2 damage profile, added 10% crit chance.

Heavies: Added shield break, Increased damage cleave from 0.3 to 0.5, Increased the damage on the first and second target, Now deals damage to armour on the second target, Lowered zerker damage on the first 2 targets from 0.6 to 0.5, Lowered armour damage on the first 2 targets from 0.5 to 0.3, Heavy damage against against target 3 increased from 0.075 to 1, Heavy damage against against target 4 and up increased from 0.05 to 0.075.
Push attack: Gave it the same profile as 1h mace light 1 and 2 damage profile and sped it up by a lot.

weapons.name: Tuskgor Spear
changes: Light 2 now chains into Heavy 1.
light 1,3: Now have same HS multiplier as elf spear.
Sped up light 3 by 10%.
light 2: Added Linesman, Sped up light 2 by ~15%.
Pushattack / Heavy : Increased damage and made the damage spread more even, Grail Knight and Footknight now have access.

weapons.name: Halberd
changes: light 1: Cleave increased by 45%, Infantry damage increased by 25%, Increased the damage the attack does to targets 2 and 3.
light 2: Increased damage by ~20%, Increased armour damage by 300%, Crit damage on armour increased by 100%.
Light 3 and push attack: Headshot coefficient reduced by 12.5%, added Ninja (overall more headshot damage).
Heavy 1: Armour damage increased by 23%, Armour crit damage increased by 60%.
Heavy 2: Infantry damage increased by ~59%, Reduced time it takes to chain into heavy 2 from 0.65 to 0.5, Increased damage and made the damage spread more even.

weapons.name: Mace and Sword
changes: Light 1,2: Increased cleave slightly, Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Increased damage against the first target (0.175 -> 0.225), Now deals 35% damage to armour on the light.
Push attacks / heavies: Gave them a new profile that is worse please don't ask for details i don't know.

weapons.name: Executioner Sword
changes: lights: Buffed attack speed by 10%, Buffed headshot coefficient on targets after 1 to the same value as target 1, Buffed cleave from ~7.5 to ~ 10.5.
Heavy 1: Removed 20% crit chance.

weapons.name: Spear and Shield
changes: Light 1,2: Increased cleave slightly, Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Increased damage against the first target (0.175 -> 0.225), Now deals 35% damage to armour on the light.

Light 3 and push attack: Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Damage multiplier against zerkers improved from 0.75 to 1.25, Damage multiplier against monsters improved from 2.5 to 3, Sped up light 4 by 15% (1.35 -> 1.5).
Heavy 3: Now has the same damage profile as tuskgor heavy.

weapons.name: Sword and Shield
changes: lights: Lights now have the same profile as 1h sword.
light 3 now has linesman.
Heavy 2: Increased damage by ~10%.

weapons.name: Bret Sword and Shield
changes: light 1: Now has the same profile as 1h sword.
light 2: Headshot coefficient improved from 1.5 to 2, Damage multiplier against zerkers improved from 0.75 to 1.25, Damage multiplier against monsters improved from 2.5 to 3.
Heavy 3: Increased damage by ~10%.
